articles.title: Gabba pitch given below average rating by ICC after two-day first Test between Australia and South Africa - ABC News
articles.description: The Gabba has been handed a below average pitch rating by the International Cricket Council after being heavily criticised by players after the first Test between Australia and South Africa ended inside two days.
articles.content:
The Gabba pitch produced for the first Test between Australia and South Africa has been rated as below average by the ICC.
